mapper.select: SELECT E.EMP_NAME , P.PROOF_NAME , P.POSITION , P.DEPT_NAME , P.PROOT_COST , P.REQUEST_DATE , P.REASON , P.RECEIPT , P.APPLOVALSTATUS FROM PROOF_LIST P , EMP E WHERE E.EMP_CODE = #{empCode} AND P.PROOF_CODE = #{proofTypeCode} AND P.REQUEST_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND E.WORKPLACE_CODE = #{workplaceCode}

SELECT D.DEPT_NAME , P.EMP_CODE , E.EMP_NAME , P.PROOF_CODE , DD.DETAIL_CODE_NAME , P.REQUEST_DATE , P.APPLOVALSTATUS , P.PROOT_COST , P.REASON , P.RECEIPT FROM PROOF_LIST P , EMP E , DEPT D , DETAIL_CODE DD WHERE P.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE(+) AND E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE(+) AND P.PROOF_CODE = DD.DETAIL_CODE_NUMBER(+) AND P.PROOF_NAME = #{deptName} AND REQUEST_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND E.WORKPLACE_CODE = #{workplaceCode}

SELECT D.DEPT_NAME , P.EMP_CODE , E.EMP_NAME , P.PROOF_CODE , DD.DETAIL_CODE_NAME , P.REQUEST_DATE , P.APPLOVALSTATUS , P.PROOT_COST , P.REASON , P.RECEIPT FROM PROOF_LIST P , EMP E , DEPT D , DETAIL_CODE DD WHERE P.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE(+) AND E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE(+) AND P.PROOF_CODE = DD.DETAIL_CODE_NUMBER(+) AND REQUEST_DATE = TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND E.WORKPLACE_CODE = #{workplaceCode}
